languages.text: "Спасибо господам офицерам, послабление ввели — каждые четыре часа можно десять минут передохнуть!"
"Our esteemed officers have relaxed the schedule — every four hours we get a ten-minute break!"
languages.original_text: "Спасибо господам офицерам, послабление ввели — каждые четыре часа можно десять минут передохнуть!"

traits.locale_text: "Our esteemed officers have relaxed the schedule — every four hours we get a ten-minute break!"
"Our esteemed officers have relaxed the schedule — every four hours we get a ten-minute break!"
"Our esteemed officers have relaxed the schedule — every four hours we get a ten-minute break!"
"Our esteemed officers have relaxed the schedule — every four hours we get a ten-minute break!"
"Our esteemed officers have relaxed the schedule — every four hours we get a ten-minute break!"

languages.text: «Nuestros estimados oficiales nos han aliviado el turno de trabajo: ¡ahora podemos tomarnos un descanso de diez minutos cada cuatro horas!».
languages.original_text: "Our esteemed officers have relaxed the schedule — every four hours we get a ten-minute break!"

traits.locale_text: «Nuestros estimados oficiales nos han aliviado el turno de trabajo: ¡ahora podemos tomarnos un descanso de diez minutos cada cuatro horas!».

languages.text: 「尊敬する役員がスケジュールを緩和した。4時間ごとに10分間の休憩を取ります！」
languages.original_text: "Our esteemed officers have relaxed the schedule — every four hours we get a ten-minute break!"

traits.locale_text: 「尊敬する役員がスケジュールを緩和した。4時間ごとに10分間の休憩を取ります！」

languages.text: “我们尊敬的长官已经放宽了劳动日程安排。每干四个小时活，就可以能休息十分钟！”
languages.original_text: "Our esteemed officers have relaxed the schedule — every four hours we get a ten-minute break!"

traits.locale_text: “我们尊敬的长官已经放宽了劳动日程安排。每干四个小时活，就可以能休息十分钟！”

languages.text: "Unsere geschätzten Offiziere haben unsere Arbeitszeiten gelockert ... wir haben alle vier Stunden zehn Minuten Pause!"
languages.original_text: "Our esteemed officers have relaxed the schedule — every four hours we get a ten-minute break!"

traits.locale_text: "Unsere geschätzten Offiziere haben unsere Arbeitszeiten gelockert ... wir haben alle vier Stunden zehn Minuten Pause!"

languages.text: « Nos honorables officiers ont assoupli nos horaires ; maintenant, on a droit à dix minutes de pause toutes les quatre heures ! »
languages.original_text: "Our esteemed officers have relaxed the schedule — every four hours we get a ten-minute break!"

traits.locale_text: « Nos honorables officiers ont assoupli nos horaires ; maintenant, on a droit à dix minutes de pause toutes les quatre heures ! »

languages.text: "Kıymetli subaylarımız, çizelgeyi rahatlattı. Artık her dört saatte bir on dakikalık molamız var!"
languages.original_text: "Our esteemed officers have relaxed the schedule — every four hours we get a ten-minute break!"
